name: Subcontracting Death
description:
A game about accidently stumbling into purgatory without any preparations. Trying to get back to heaven by working for reapers who are understaffed, overworked, and to be fair.... not super competent.

The goal is lots of dialogue choices, not all of which will get you to your goal.Have fun!

Developer/Level Design - Jake Skarupa

Character Models/Animations/Level Design - Kai Skarupa

Dialogue and UI design - Kassie Weiler/Jake Skarupa

Play Testing/Tuning/Breaking Stuff - Justin Boux

This was our first game jam. Turned into a nice family activity over the last week! We had alot of fun and looking forward to getting some feedback and playing some other peoples games!
